itlt.java.arch.require.title: 64bit Java required
itlt.java.arch.require.body: Whoops! This pack requires 64bit Java but you appear to be using 32bit Java.
itlt.java.arch.warning.title: 64bit Java recommended
itlt.java.arch.warning.body: Warning: You appear to be using 32bit Java - this pack recommends 64bit Java for the best experience.
itlt.java.version.require.title: Java %s+ required
itlt.java.version.require.body: Whoops! This pack requires Java %s or newer but you appear to be using Java %sb.
itlt.java.version.warning.title: Java %s+ recommended
itlt.java.version.warning.body: Warning: For the best experience, this pack recommends Java %s or newer but you appear to be using Java %sb.
itlt.java.memory.min.require.title: More allocated RAM required
itlt.java.memory.min.require.body: Whoops! This pack requires at least %sGB but you appear to be allocating %sbGB of RAM.
itlt.java.memory.min.warning.title: More allocated RAM recommended
itlt.java.memory.min.warning.body: Warning: For the best experience, this pack must have at least %sGB but you appear to be allocating %sbGB of RAM.
itlt.java.memory.max.require.title: Less allocated RAM required
itlt.java.memory.max.require.body: Whoops! This pack must not have more than %sGB but you appear to be allocating %sbGB of RAM.
itlt.java.memory.max.warning.title: Less allocated RAM recommended
itlt.java.memory.max.warning.body: Warning: For the best experience, this pack must not have more than %sGB but you appear to be allocating %sbGB of RAM.
